name: Alien Flappy
description:
My name is Marcos Barros, I am a student at Estacio de Sa University at Brazil, Bachelor of Technology in Game Development. It's my first game solo for Mobile. Any feedback is welcome.  And the most important, if you want to help me to make more games, any donation is welcome.

*Alien Flappy is FREE! You can download from Google Play Store pressing the Google Play button below. If you want to support the developer, you can donate US$ 1, US$ 2, US$ 5.... And you'll receive the APK as a thank you for your support.
